Attribute CSV Apache ORC Apache Parquet Name CSV Apache ORC Apache Parquet Description Comma-Separated Values (CSV) is a text file format that uses commas to separate values in plain text. ORC is a self-describing type-aware columnar file format designed for Hadoop workloads. Apache Parquet is an open source, column-oriented data file format designed for efficient data storage and retrieval.
